title: Southampton Action
subtitle:
Did You Know? #DidYouKnow
If people are recognised as refugees in the UK, they are usually given 5 years leave to remain.
After those 5 years have passed, they have to apply to the Home Office if they wish to remain in the country.
#Refugees #RefugeesWelcome #AsylumSeekerspic.twitter.com/IO7KjUWkpR
